bioAsHtml: Vijay has been developing software for over 13 years on JVM platform, ranging from large Enterprise applications to Desktop and Mobile Apps. His choice of languages - Scala by day and Clojure by night and Haskell in the weekends. After writing software in OOP for well over 10 years, Vijay is now honing up his skills in Functional Programming and large scale FP design.
